name: bulbasaur
flavorText: ___ can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun’s rays, the seed grows progressively larger.

name: ivysaur
flavorText: To support its bulb, ___’s legs grow sturdy. If it spends more time lying in the sunlight, the bud will soon bloom into a large flower.

name: venusaur
flavorText: ___’s flower is said to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower’s aroma soothes the emotions of people.

name: charmander
flavorText: The flame that burns at the tip of its tail is an indication of its emotions. The flame wavers when ___ is happy, and blazes when it is enraged.

name: charmeleon
flavorText: Without pity, its sharp claws destroy foes. If it encounters a strong enemy, it becomes agitated, and the flame on its tail flares with a bluish white color.

name: charizard
flavorText: A ___ flies about in search of strong opponents. It breathes intense flames that can melt any material. However, it will never torch a weaker foe.

name: squirtle
flavorText: Its shell is not just for protection. Its rounded shape and the grooves on its surface minimize resistance in water, enabling ___ to swim at high speeds.

name: wartortle
flavorText: Its large tail is covered with rich, thick fur that deepens in color with age. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this POKéMON’s toughness in battle.

name: blastoise
flavorText: The waterspouts that protrude from its shell are highly accurate. Their bullets of water can precisely nail tin cans from a distance of over 160 feet.

name: caterpie
flavorText: Its voracious appetite compels it to devour leaves bigger than itself without hesitation. It releases a terribly strong odor from its antennae.

name: metapod
flavorText: Its shell is as hard as an iron slab. A ___ does not move very much because it is preparing its soft innards for evolution inside the shell.

name: butterfree
flavorText: It has a superior ability to search for delicious honey from flowers. It can seek, extract, and carry honey from flowers blooming over six miles away.

name: weedle
flavorText: A ___ has an extremely acute sense of smell. It distinguishes its favorite kinds of leaves from those it dislikes by sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).

name: kakuna
flavorText: It remains virtually immobile while it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it busily prepares for evolution. This is evident from how hot its shell becomes.

name: beedrill
flavorText: A ___ is extremely territorial. For safety reasons, no one should  ever approach its nest. If angered, they will attack in a swarm.

name: pidgey
flavorText: It has an extremely sharp sense of direction. It can unerringly return home to its nest, however far it may be removed from its familiar surroundings.

name: pidgeotto
flavorText: This POKéMON flies around, patrolling its large territory. If its living space is violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughly punishing the foe with its sharp claws.

name: pidgeot
flavorText: This POKéMON has gorgeous, glossy feathers. Many TRAINERS are so captivated by the beautiful feathers on its head that they choose ___ as their POKéMON.

name: rattata
flavorText: A ___ is cautious in the extreme. Even while it is asleep, it constantly moves its ears and listens for danger. It will make its nest anywhere.

name: raticate
flavorText: A ___’s sturdy fangs grow steadily. To keep them ground down, it gnaws on rocks and logs. It may even chew on the walls of houses.

name: spearow
flavorText: Its loud cry can be heard over half a mile away. If its high, keening cry is heard echoing all around, it is a sign that they are warning each other of danger.

name: fearow
flavorText: Its long neck and elongated beak are ideal for catching prey in soil or water. It deftly moves this extended and skinny beak to pluck prey.

name: ekans
flavorText: An ___ curls itself up in a spiral while it rests. This position allows it to quickly respond to an enemy from any direction with a threat from its upraised head.

name: arbok
flavorText: This POKéMON has a terrifically strong constricting power. It can even flatten steel oil drums. Once it wraps its body around its foe, escaping is impossible.

name: pikachu
flavorText: It stores electricity in the electric sacs on its cheeks. When it releases pent-up energy in a burst, the electric power is equal to a lightning bolt.

name: raichu
flavorText: If it stores too much electricity, its behavior turns aggressive. To avoid this, it occasionally discharges excess energy and calms itself down.

name: sandshrew
flavorText: When it curls up in a ball, it can make any attack bounce off harmlessly. Its hide has turned tough and solid as a result of living in the desert.

name: sandslash
flavorText: It curls up in a ball to protect itself from enemy attacks. It also curls up to prevent heatstroke during the daytime when temperatures rise sharply.

name: nidoran-m
flavorText: Its highly toxic barbs are thought to have developed as protection for this small- bodied POKéMON. When enraged, it releases a horrible toxin from its horn.

name: nidorina
flavorText: When it is with its friends or family, its barbs are tucked away to prevent injury. It appears to become nervous if separated from the others.

name: nidoqueen
flavorText: It is adept at sending foes flying with harsh tackles using its tough, scaly body. This POKéMON is at its strongest when it is defending its young.

name: nidoran-f
flavorText: The male ___ has developed muscles that freely move its ears in any direction. Even the slightest sound does not escape this POKéMON’s notice.

name: nidorino
flavorText: Its horn is harder than a diamond. If it senses a hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it challenges the foe with all its might.

name: nidoking
flavorText: A ___’s thick tail packs enormously destructive power capable of toppling a metal transmission tower. Once it goes on a rampage, there is no stopping it.

name: clefairy
flavorText: On every night of a full moon, they come out to play. When dawn arrives, the tired ___ go to sleep nestled up against each other in deep and quiet mountains.

name: clefable
flavorText: A ___ uses its wings to skip lightly  as if it were flying. Its bouncy step lets it even walk on water. On quiet, moonlit nights, it strolls on lakes.

name: vulpix
flavorText: It can freely control fire, making fiery orbs fly like will-o’-the-wisps. Just before evolution, its six tails grow hot  as if on fire.

name: ninetales
flavorText: It has long been said that each of the nine tails embody an enchanted power. A long-lived ___ will have fur that shines like gold.

name: jigglypuff
flavorText: Nothing can avoid falling asleep hearing a ___’s song. The sound waves of its singing voice match the brain waves of someone in a deep sleep.

name: wigglytuff
flavorText: Its fur is the ultimate in luxuriousness. Sleeping alongside a ___ is simply divine. Its body expands seemingly without end when it inhales.

name: zubat
flavorText: While living in pitch-black caverns, their eyes gradually grew shut and deprived them of vision. They use ultrasonic waves to detect obstacles.

name: golbat
flavorText: Its fangs easily puncture even thick animal hide. It loves to feast on the blood of people and POKéMON. It flits about in darkness and strikes from behind.

name: oddish
flavorText: This POKéMON grows by absorbing moonlight. During the daytime, it buries itself in the ground, leaving only its leaves exposed to avoid detection by its enemies.

name: gloom
flavorText: A horribly noxious honey drools from its mouth. One whiff of the honey can result in memory loss. Some fans are said to enjoy this overwhelming stink, however.

name: vileplume
flavorText: In seasons when it produces more pollen, the air around a ___ turns yellow with the powder as it walks. The pollen is highly toxic and causes paralysis.

name: paras
flavorText: A ___ has parasitic tochukaso mushrooms growing on its back. They grow by drawing nutrients from the host. They are valued as a medicine for long life.

name: parasect
flavorText: ___ are known to infest the roots of large trees en masse and drain nutrients. When an infested tree dies, they move onto another tree all at once.

name: venonat
flavorText: Its coat of thin, stiff hair that covers its entire body is said to have evolved for protection. Its large eyes never fail to spot even miniscule prey.

name: venomoth
flavorText: ___ are nocturnal--they only are active at night. Their favorite prey are insects that gather around streetlights, attracted by the light in the darkness.

name: diglett
flavorText: ___ are raised in most farms. The reason is simple--wherever they burrow, the soil is left perfectly tilled for growing delicious crops.

name: dugtrio
flavorText: Because the triplets originally split from one body, they think exactly alike. They work cooperatively to burrow endlessly through the ground.

name: meowth
flavorText: ___ withdraw their sharp claws into their paws to silently sneak about. For some reason, this POKéMON loves shiny coins that glitter with light.

name: persian
flavorText: A ___’s six bold whiskers sense air movements to determine what is in its vicinity. It becomes docile if grabbed by the whiskers.

name: psyduck
flavorText: When its headache intensifies, it starts using strange powers. However, it has no recollection of its powers, so it always looks befuddled and bewildered.

name: golduck
flavorText: A ___ is an adept swimmer. It sometimes joins competitive swimmers in training. It uses psychic powers when its forehead shimmers with light.

name: mankey
flavorText: When it starts shaking and its nasal breathing turns rough, it’s a sure sign of anger. However, since this happens instantly, there is no time to flee.

name: primeape
flavorText: When it becomes furious, its blood circulation becomes more robust, and its muscles are made stronger. But it also becomes much less intelligent.

name: growlithe
flavorText: Its superb sense of smell ensures that this POKéMON won’t forget any scent, no matter what. It uses its sense of smell to detect the emotions of others.

name: arcanine
flavorText: This fleet-footed POKéMON is said to run over 6,200 miles in a single day and night. The fire that blazes wildly within its body is its source of power.

name: poliwag
flavorText: It is possible to see this POKéMON’s spiral innards right through its thin skin. However, the skin is also very flexible. Even sharp fangs bounce right off it.

name: poliwhirl
flavorText: Its body surface is always wet and slick with an oily fluid. Because of this greasy covering, it can easily slip and slide out of the clutches of any enemy in battle.

name: poliwrath
flavorText: Its highly developed muscles never grow fatigued, however much it exercises. This POKéMON can swim back and forth across the Pacific Ocean without effort.

name: abra
flavorText: A POKéMON that sleeps 18 hours a day. Observation revealed that it uses TELEPORT to change its location once every hour.

name: kadabra
flavorText: It is rumored that a boy with psychic abilities suddenly transformed into ___ while he was assisting research into extrasensory powers.

name: alakazam
flavorText: While it has strong psychic abilities and high intelligence, an ___’s muscles are very weak. It uses psychic power to move its body.

name: machop
flavorText: It continually undertakes strenuous training to master all forms of martial arts. Its strength lets it easily hoist a sumo wrestler onto its shoulders.

name: machoke
flavorText: A belt is worn by a ___ to keep its overwhelming power under control. Because it is so dangerous, no one has ever removed the belt.

name: machamp
flavorText: It is impossible to defend against punches and chops doled out by its four arms. Its fighting spirit flares up when it faces a tough opponent.

name: bellsprout
flavorText: A ___’s thin and flexible body lets it bend and sway to avoid any attack, however strong it may be. From its mouth, it leaks a fluid that melts even iron.

name: weepinbell
flavorText: At night, a ___ hangs on to a tree branch with its hooked rear and sleeps. If it moves around in its sleep, it may wake up to find itself on the ground.

name: victreebel
flavorText: The long vine extending from its head is waved about as if it were a living thing to attract prey. When an unsuspecting victim approaches, it is swallowed whole.

name: tentacool
flavorText: Its body is almost entirely composed of water. It ensnares its foe with its two long tentacles, then stabs with the poison stingers at their tips.

name: tentacruel
flavorText: It lives in complex rock formations on the ocean floor and traps prey using its 80 tentacles. Its red orbs glow when it grows excited or agitated.

name: geodude
flavorText: It climbs mountain paths using only the power of its arms. Because they look just like boulders lining paths, hikers may step on them without noticing.

name: graveler
flavorText: They descend from mountains by tumbling down steep slopes. They are so brutal, they smash aside obstructing trees and massive boulders with thunderous tackles.

name: golem
flavorText: It is said to live in volcanic craters on mountain peaks. Once a year, it sheds its hide and grows larger. The shed hide crumbles and returns to the soil.

name: ponyta
flavorText: A ___ is very weak at birth. It can barely stand up. Its legs become stronger as it stumbles and falls while trying to keep up with its parent.

name: rapidash
flavorText: It usually canters casually in the fields and plains. But once a ___ turns serious, its fiery manes flare and blaze as it gallops its way up to 150 mph.

name: slowpoke
flavorText: It catches prey by dipping its tail in water at the side of a river. But it often forgets what it is doing and spends entire days just loafing at water’s edge.

name: slowbro
flavorText: Its tail has a SHELLDER firmly attached with a bite. As a result, the tail can’t be used for fishing anymore. This forces it to reluctantly swim and catch prey.

name: magnemite
flavorText: The units at its sides are extremely powerful magnets. They generate enough magnetism to draw in iron objects from over 300 feet away.

name: magneton
flavorText: It is actually three ___ linked by magnetism. It generates powerful radio waves that raise temperatures by 3.6 degrees F within a 3,300-foot radius.

name: farfetch'd
flavorText: It is always seen with a stick from a plant. Apparently, there are good sticks and bad sticks. This POKéMON occasionally fights with others over choice sticks.

name: doduo
flavorText: Even while eating or sleeping, one of the heads remains always vigilant for any sign of danger. When threatened, it flees at over 60 miles per hour.

name: dodrio
flavorText: A peculiar POKéMON species with three heads. It vigorously races across grassy plains even in arid seasons with little rainfall.

name: seel
flavorText: ___ hunt for prey in frigid, ice-covered seas. When it needs to breathe, it punches a hole through the ice with the sharply protruding section of its head.

name: dewgong
flavorText: It loves to snooze on bitterly cold ice. The sight of this POKéMON sleeping on a glacier was mistakenly thought to be a mermaid by a mariner long ago.

name: grimer
flavorText: Born from polluted sludge in the sea, ___’s favorite food is anything filthy. They feed on wastewater pumped out from factories.

name: muk
flavorText: It prefers warm and humid habitats. In the summertime, the toxic substances in its body intensify, making ___ reek like putrid kitchen garbage.

name: shellder
flavorText: At night, it burrows a hole in the seafloor with its broad tongue to make a place to sleep. While asleep, it closes its shell, but leaves its tongue hanging out.

name: cloyster
flavorText: It swims in the sea by swallowing water, then jetting it out toward the rear. The ___ shoots spikes from its shell using the same system.

name: gastly
flavorText: When exposed to a strong wind, a ___’s gaseous body quickly dwindles away. They cluster under the eaves of houses to escape the ravages of wind.

name: haunter
flavorText: If a ___ beckons you while it is floating in darkness, don’t approach it. This POKéMON will try to lick you with its tongue and steal your life away.

name: gengar
flavorText: Deep in the night, your shadow cast by a streetlight may suddenly overtake you. It is actually a ___ running past you, pretending to be your shadow.

name: onix
flavorText: There is a magnet in its brain that prevents an ___ from losing direction while tunneling. As it grows older, its body becomes steadily rounder and smoother.

name: drowzee
flavorText: If your nose becomes itchy while you are sleeping, it’s a sure sign that a ___ is standing above your pillow and trying to eat your dream through your nostrils.

name: hypno
flavorText: The arcing movement and glitter of the pendulum in a ___’s hand lull the foe into deep hypnosis. While searching for prey, it polishes the pendulum.

name: krabby
flavorText: ___ live in holes dug into beaches. On sandy shores with little in the way of food, they can be seen squabbling with each other over territory.

name: kingler
flavorText: It waves its huge, oversized claw in the air to communicate with others. But since the claw is so heavy, this POKéMON quickly tires.

name: voltorb
flavorText: It bears an uncanny and unexplained resemblance to a POKé BALL. Because it explodes at the slightest shock, even veteran TRAINERS treat it with caution.

name: electrode
flavorText: They appear in great numbers at electric power plants. Because they feed on electricity, they cause massive and chaotic blackouts in nearby cities.

name: exeggcute
flavorText: It consists of six eggs that care for each other. The eggs attract each other and spin around. When cracks increasingly appear, it is close to evolution.

name: exeggutor
flavorText: Originally from the tropics, ___’s heads grow larger from exposure to strong sunlight. It is said that when the heads fall, they group to form an ___.

name: cubone
flavorText: It pines for the mother it will never see again. Seeing a likeness of its mother in the full moon, it cries. The stains on the skull it wears are from its tears.

name: marowak
flavorText: A ___ is the evolved form of a ___ that has grown tough by overcoming the grief of losing its mother. Its tempered and hardened spirit is not easily broken.

name: hitmonlee
flavorText: Its legs freely stretch and contract. Using these springlike limbs, it bowls over foes with devastating kicks. After battle, it rubs down its tired legs.

name: hitmonchan
flavorText: A ___ is said to possess the spirit of a boxer who aimed to become the world champion. Having an indomitable spirit means that it will never give up.

name: lickitung
flavorText: Whenever it sees something unfamiliar, it always licks the object because it memorizes things by texture and taste. It is somewhat put off by sour things.

name: koffing
flavorText: Getting up close to a ___ will give you a chance to observe, through its thin skin, the toxic gases swirling inside. It blows up at the slightest stimulation.

name: weezing
flavorText: By diluting its toxic gases with a special process, the highest grade of perfume can be extracted. To ___, gases emanating from garbage are the ultimate feast.

name: rhyhorn
flavorText: Once it starts running, it doesn’t stop. Its tiny brain makes it so stupid that it can’t remember why it started running in the first place.

name: rhydon
flavorText: Its horn, which rotates like a drill, destroys tall buildings with one strike. It stands on its hind legs, and its brain is well developed.

name: chansey
flavorText: ___ lay nutritionally excellent eggs every day. The eggs are so delicious, they are eagerly devoured by even those people who have lost their appetite.

name: tangela
flavorText: Its vines snap off easily and painlessly if they are grabbed, allowing it to make a quick getaway. The lost vines are replaced by new growth the very next day.

name: kangaskhan
flavorText: If you come across a young ___ playing by itself, never try to catch it. The baby’s parent is sure to be in the area, and it will become violently enraged.

name: horsea
flavorText: By cleverly flicking the fins on its back side to side, it moves in any direction while facing forward. It spits ink to escape if it senses danger.

name: seadra
flavorText: The poisonous barbs all over its body are highly valued as ingredients for making traditional herbal medicine. It shows no mercy to anything approaching its nest.

name: goldeen
flavorText: In the springtime, schools of ___ can be seen swimming up falls and rivers. It metes out staggering damage with its single horn.

name: seaking
flavorText: It punches holes in boulders on stream­ beds. This is a clever innovation that prevents its eggs from being attacked or washed away by the current.

name: staryu
flavorText: It gathers with others in the night and makes its red core glow on and off with the twinkling stars. It can regenerate limbs if they are severed from its body.

name: starmie
flavorText: People in ancient times imagined that ___ were transformed from the reflections of stars that twinkled on gentle waves at night.

name: mr-mime
flavorText: A ___ is a master of pantomime. It can convince others that something unseeable actually exists. Once believed, the imaginary object does become real.

name: scyther
flavorText: Its blindingly fast speed adds to the sharpness of its twin forearm scythes. The scythes can slice through thick logs in one wicked stroke.

name: jynx
flavorText: A ___ sashays rhythmically as if it were dancing. Its motions are so bouncingly alluring, people seeing it are compelled to shake their hips without noticing.

name: electabuzz
flavorText: When a storm approaches, it competes with others to scale heights that are likely to be stricken by lightning. Some towns use ___ in place of lightning rods.

name: magmar
flavorText: In battle, it blows out intense flames from all over its body to intimidate its foe. These fiery bursts create heat waves that ignite grass and trees in the area.

name: pinsir
flavorText: Their pincers are strong enough to shatter thick logs. Because they dislike cold, ___ burrow and sleep under the ground on chilly nights.

name: tauros
flavorText: It is not satisfied unless it is rampaging at all times. If there is no opponent for ___ to battle, it will charge at thick trees and knock them down to calm itself.

name: magikarp
flavorText: Its swimming muscles are weak, so it is easily washed away by currents. In places where water pools, you can see many ___ deposited there by the flow.

name: gyarados
flavorText: It is an extremely vicious and violent POKéMON. When humans begin to fight, it will appear and burn everything to the ground with intensely hot flames.

name: lapras
flavorText: People have driven ___ almost to the point of extinction. In the evenings, it is said to sing plaintively as it seeks what few others of its kind still remain.

name: ditto
flavorText: A ___ rearranges its cell structure to transform itself. However, if it tries to change based on its memory, it will get details wrong.

name: eevee
flavorText: An ___ has an unstable genetic makeup that suddenly mutates due to its environment. Radiation from various STONES causes this POKéMON to evolve.

name: vaporeon
flavorText: ___ underwent a spontaneous mutation and grew fins and gills that allow them to live underwater. They have the ability to freely control water.

name: jolteon
flavorText: Its cells generate weak power that is amplified by its fur’s static electricity to drop thunderbolts. The bristling fur is made of electrically charged needles.

name: flareon
flavorText: ___’s fluffy fur releases heat into the air so that its body does not get excessively hot. Its body temperature can rise to a maximum of 1,650 degrees F.

name: porygon
flavorText: It is capable of reverting itself entirely back to program data in order to enter cyberspace. A ___ is copy- protected so it cannot be duplicated.

name: omanyte
flavorText: One of the ancient and long-since-extinct POKéMON that have been regenerated from fossils by humans. If attacked, it withdraws into its hard shell.

name: omastar
flavorText: An ___ uses its tentacles to capture its prey. It is believed to have become extinct because its shell grew too large, making its movements slow and ponderous.

name: kabuto
flavorText: It is a POKéMON that has been regenerated from a fossil. However, in rare cases, living examples have been discovered. ___ have not changed for 300 million years.

name: kabutops
flavorText: ___ once swam underwater to hunt  for prey. It was apparently evolving from being a water dweller to living on land as evident from changes in its gills and legs.

name: aerodactyl
flavorText: ___ is a POKéMON from the age of dinosaurs. It was regenerated from DNA extracted from amber. It is imagined to have been the king of the skies.

name: snorlax
flavorText: ___’s typical day consists of nothing more than eating and sleeping. It is such a docile POKéMON that there are children who use its big belly as a place to play.

name: articuno
flavorText: ___ is a legendary bird POKéMON that can control ice. The flapping of its wings chills the air. As a result, it is said that when this POKéMON flies, snow will fall.

name: zapdos
flavorText: ___ is a legendary bird POKéMON that has the ability to control electricity. It usually lives in thunderclouds. It gains power if it is stricken by lightning bolts.

name: moltres
flavorText: ___ is a legendary bird POKéMON that can control fire. If injured, it is said to dip its body in the molten magma of a volcano to burn and heal itself.

name: dratini
flavorText: A ___ continually molts and sloughs off its old skin. It does so because the life energy within its body steadily builds to reach uncontrollable levels.

name: dragonair
flavorText: A ___ stores an enormous amount of energy inside its body. It is said to alter the weather around it by loosing energy from the crystals on its neck and tail.

name: dragonite
flavorText: It can circle the globe in just 16 hours. It is a kindhearted POKéMON that leads lost and foundering ships in a storm to the safety of land.

name: mewtwo
flavorText: A POKéMON that was created by genetic manipulation. However, even though the scientific power of humans made its body, they failed to give it a warm heart.

name: mew
flavorText: A ___ is said to possess the genes of all POKéMON. It is capable of making itself invisible at will, so it entirely avoids notice even if it approaches people.

name: chikorita
flavorText: It waves its leaf around to keep foes at bay. However, a sweet fragrance also wafts from the leaf, creating a friendly atmosphere that becalms the battlers.

name: bayleef
flavorText: A ___’s neck is ringed by curled-up leaves. Inside each leaf is a small tree shoot. The fragrance of this shoot makes people peppy.

name: meganium
flavorText: The fragrance of a ___’s flower soothes and calms emotions. In battle, it gives off more of its becalming scent to blunt the foe’s fighting spirit.

name: cyndaquil
flavorText: It flares flames from its back to protect itself. The fire burns vigorously if the POKéMON is angry. When it is tired, it sputters with incomplete combustion.

name: quilava
flavorText: It intimidates foes with intense gusts of flames and superheated air. Its quick nimbleness lets it dodge attacks even while scorching an enemy.

name: typhlosion
flavorText: It can hide behind a shimmering heat haze that it creates using its intense flames. ___ create blazing explosive blasts that burn everything to cinders.

name: totodile
flavorText: Despite its small body, ___’s jaws are very powerful. While it may think it is just playfully nipping, its bite has enough strength to cause serious injury.

name: croconaw
flavorText: Once its jaws clamp down on its foe, it will absolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are forked back like fishhooks, they become irremovably embedded.

name: feraligatr
flavorText: It opens its huge mouth to intimidate enemies. In battle, it runs using its thick and powerful hind legs to charge the foe with incredible speed.

name: sentret
flavorText: They take turns standing guard when it is time to sleep. The sentry awakens the others if it senses danger. If one becomes separated, it turns sleepless with fear.

name: furret
flavorText: A ___ has a very slim build. When under attack, it can squirm through narrow spaces and get away. In spite of its short limbs, it is very nimble and fleet.

name: hoothoot
flavorText: It has an internal organ that senses the earth’s rotation. Using this special organ, a ___ begins hooting at precisely the same time every day.

name: noctowl
flavorText: It unfailingly catches prey in darkness. ___ owe their success to superior vision that allows them to see in minimal light, and to their supple and silent wings.

name: ledyba
flavorText: ___ communicate using a fluid that they secrete from where the legs join the body. They are said to convey feelings to others by altering the fluid’s scent.

name: ledian
flavorText: It is said that in lands with clean air, where the stars fill the sky, there live many ___. For good reason, they use the light of the stars as energy.

name: spinarak
flavorText: The web it spins can be considered its second nervous system. It is said that a ___ determines its prey by the tiny vibrations it feels through the web.

name: ariados
flavorText: Its feet are tipped with tiny hooked claws that enable it to scuttle on ceilings and vertical walls. It constricts its foe with thin and strong silk webbing.

name: crobat
flavorText: Over the course of evolution, its hind legs turned into wings. By alternately resting its front and rear wings, it can fly all day without having to stop.

name: chinchou
flavorText: When it senses danger, it discharges positive and negative electricity from its two antennae. It lives in depths beyond sunlight’s reach.

name: lanturn
flavorText: The light-emitting orbs on its back are very bright. They are formed from a part of its dorsal fin. This POKéMON illuminates the inky darkness of deep seas.

name: pichu
flavorText: It is still inept at retaining electricity. When it is startled, it discharges power accidentally. It gets better at holding power as it grows older.

name: cleffa
flavorText: On nights with many shooting stars, ___ can be seen dancing in a ring. They dance until daybreak, when they quench their thirst with the morning dew.

name: igglybuff
flavorText: Its soft and pliable body is very bouncy. When it sings continuously with all its might, its body steadily turns a deepening pink color.

name: togepi
flavorText: As its energy, it uses the feelings of compassion and pleasure exuded by people and POKéMON. It stores up happy feelings in its shell, then shares them out.

name: togetic
flavorText: It is said to be a POKéMON that brings good fortune. When it spots someone who is pure of heart, a ___ appears and shares its happiness with that person.

name: natu
flavorText: It runs up short trees that grow on the savanna to peck at new shoots. A ___’s eyes look as if they are always observing something.

name: xatu
flavorText: It has the enigmatic power of foreseeing the future. Some people in different lands have long believed that ___ are emissaries from another world.

name: mareep
flavorText: Its fluffy wool rubs together and builds a static charge. The more energy is charged, the more brightly the lightbulb at the tip of its tail glows.

name: flaaffy
flavorText: Its fleece quality changes to generate strong static electricity with a small amount of wool. The bare, slick parts of its hide are shielded against electricity.

name: ampharos
flavorText: It gives off so much light that it can be seen even from space. People in the old days used its light to send signals back and forth with others far away.

name: bellossom
flavorText: Its flower petals deepen in color through exposure to sunlight. When cloudy weather persists, it does a dance that is thought to be a ritual for summoning the sun.

name: marill
flavorText: Its body is covered with water-repellent fur. Because of the fur, it can swim through water at high speed without being slowed by the water’s resistance.

name: azumarill
flavorText: It lives in water virtually all day long. Its body color and pattern act as camouflage that makes it tough for enemies to spot in water.

name: sudowoodo
flavorText: It mimics a tree to avoid being attacked by enemies. But since its forelegs remain green throughout the year, it is easily identified as a fake in the winter.

name: politoed
flavorText: The curled hair on its head proves its status as a king. It is said that the longer and curlier the hair, the more respect it earns from its peers.

name: hoppip
flavorText: This POKéMON drifts and floats with the wind. If it senses the approach of strong winds, a ___ links leaves with others to prepare against being blown away.

name: skiploom
flavorText: It blossoms when the temperature rises above 64 degrees F. Because its flower’s blooming changes with the temperature, it is sometimes used as a thermometer.

name: jumpluff
flavorText: ___ ride warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly to foreign lands. This POKéMON lands when it encounters cold air while it is floating.

name: aipom
flavorText: Its tail ends with a dexterous, handlike appendage. However, because it uses the tail so much, ___’s real hands have become rather clumsy.

name: sunkern
flavorText: ___ try to minimize movement to conserve the nutrients they have stored in their bodies for evolution. They will not eat, subsisting only on morning dew.

name: sunflora
flavorText: ___ convert solar energy into nutrition. They are highly active in the warm daytime but suddenly stop moving as soon as the sun sets.

name: yanma
flavorText: It can see 360 degrees without moving its eyes. It is a great flier capable of making sudden stops and turning midair to quickly chase down targeted prey.

name: wooper
flavorText: ___ usually live in water but come out onto land seeking food occasionally. On land, they coat their bodies with a gooey, toxic film.

name: quagsire
flavorText: A ___ hunts by leaving its mouth wide open in water and waiting for its prey to blunder in. Because it doesn’t move, it does not get very hungry.

name: espeon
flavorText: An ___ is extremely loyal to any TRAINER it considers to be worthy. It is said to have developed precognitive powers to protect its TRAINER from harm.

name: umbreon
flavorText: ___ evolved from exposure to the moon’s energy pulses. It lurks in darkness and waits for its foes to move. The rings on its body glow when it leaps to attack.

name: murkrow
flavorText: ___ were feared as the alleged bearers of ill fortune. It shows strong interest in anything that sparkles. It will even try to steal rings from women.

name: slowking
flavorText: It undertakes research every day to solve the mysteries of the world. However, it apparently forgets everything if the SHELLDER on its head comes off.

name: misdreavus
flavorText: A ___ frightens people with a creepy, sobbing cry. It apparently uses its red spheres to absorb the fear of foes as its nutrition.

name: unown
flavorText: This POKéMON is shaped like ancient text characters. Although research is ongoing, it is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various ___.

name: wobbuffet
flavorText: Usually docile, a ___ strikes back ferociously if its black tail is attacked. It makes its lair in caves where it waits for nightfall.

name: girafarig
flavorText: A ___ is an herbivore--it eats grass and tree shoots. While it is eating, its tail makes chewing and swallowing motions as if it were also eating.

name: pineco
flavorText: A ___ hangs from a tree branch and waits for prey. While eating, if it is disturbed by someone shaking its tree, it falls on the ground and suddenly explodes.

name: forretress
flavorText: It keeps itself inside its steel shell. The shell is opened when it is catching prey, but it is so quick that the shell’s inside cannot be seen.

name: dunsparce
flavorText: Its drill-tipped tail is used to burrow into the ground backwards. This POKéMON is known to make its nest in complex shapes deep under the ground.

name: gligar
flavorText: It glides without making a single sound. It grasps the face of its foe using its hind and large front claws, then stabs with its poison barb.

name: steelix
flavorText: ___ live even further underground than ___. This POKéMON is known to dig toward the earth’s core, reaching a depth of over six-tenths of a mile underground.

name: snubbull
flavorText: By baring its fangs and making a scary face, it sends smaller POKéMON scurrying in terror. The ___ does seem a little sad at making its foes flee.

name: granbull
flavorText: It has a particularly well-developed lower jaw. The huge fangs are heavy, causing it to tilt its head. Unless it is startled, it will not try to bite.

name: qwilfish
flavorText: A ___ uses the pressure of water it swallows to shoot toxic quills all at once from all over its body. It finds swimming to be somewhat challenging.

name: scizor
flavorText: A ___ has a body with the hardness of steel. It is not easily fazed by ordinary sorts of attacks. It flaps its wings to regulate its body temperature.

name: shuckle
flavorText: A ___ hides under rocks, keeping its body concealed inside its shell while eating stored berries. The berries mix with its body fluids to become a juice.

name: heracross
flavorText: They gather in forests seeking the sweet sap of trees. It is completely clad in a steel-hard shell. It is proud of its horn, which it uses to fling foes.

name: sneasel
flavorText: A ___ scales trees by punching its hooked claws into the bark. It seeks out unguarded nests and steals eggs for food while the parents are away.

name: teddiursa
flavorText: It licks its palms that are sweetened by being soaked in honey. A ___ makes its own honey by blending fruits and pollen collected by BEEDRILL.

name: ursaring
flavorText: In forests, it is said that there are many streams and towering trees where an ___ gathers food. It walks through its forest collecting food every day.

name: slugma
flavorText: It is a species of POKéMON that lives in volcanic areas. If its body cools, its skin hardens and immobilizes it. To avoid that, it sleeps near magma.

name: magcargo
flavorText: The shell on its back is made of hardened magma. Tens of thousands of years spent living in volcanic craters have turned ___’s bodies into magma.

name: swinub
flavorText: It roots for food by rubbing its snout against the ground. Its favorite food is a mushroom that grows under dried grass. It occasionally roots out hot springs.

name: piloswine
flavorText: A ___ is covered by a thick coat of long hair for enduring freezing cold. It uses its tusks to dig up food that has been buried under ice.

name: corsola
flavorText: ___ live in warm southern seas. If the sea becomes polluted, the beautiful coral stalks become discolored and crumble away in tatters.

name: remoraid
flavorText: A ___ uses its abdominal muscles to forcefully expel swallowed water, then shoot down flying prey. When evolution approaches, it travels down rivers.

name: octillery
flavorText: It ensnares its foe with its suction- cupped tentacles before delivering the finishing blow. If the foe turns out to be too strong, it spews ink to escape.

name: delibird
flavorText: It carries food bundled up in its tail. There was a famous explorer who managed to scale Mt. Everest thanks to a ___ sharing its food.

name: mantine
flavorText: On sunny days, schools of ___ can be seen elegantly leaping over the waves. It is not bothered by the REMORAID that hitches rides.

name: skarmory
flavorText: A POKéMON that has a body and wings of steel. People in the past used feathers fallen from ___ to make swords and knives.

name: houndour
flavorText: ___ communicate with each other using a variety of cries to corner their prey. This POKéMON’s remarkable teamwork is simply unparalleled.

name: houndoom
flavorText: In a ___ pack, the one with its horns raked sharply back serves a leadership role. They choose their leader by fighting among themselves.

name: kingdra
flavorText: It sleeps quietly, deep on the seafloor. When it comes up to the surface, it creates a huge whirlpool that can swallow even ships.

name: phanpy
flavorText: ___’s big ears serve as broad fans. When it becomes hot, it flaps the ears busily to cool down. Even the young are very strong.

name: donphan
flavorText: A ___ is so strong it can easily haul a dump truck. Its hide has toughened to a rock-hard state. An ordinary sort of attack won’t even leave a scratch.

name: porygon2
flavorText: It was created by humans using the power of science. It has been given artificial intelligence that enables it to learn new gestures and emotions on its own.

name: stantler
flavorText: ___’s magnificent antlers were once traded at high prices as works of art. As a result, this POKéMON was hunted close to extinction.

name: smeargle
flavorText: A ___ marks its territory using a fluid that leaks out from the tip of its tail. About 5,000 different marks left by this POKéMON have been found.

name: tyrogue
flavorText: ___ become stressed out if they do not get to train every day. When raising this POKéMON, the TRAINER must establish a regular training schedule.

name: hitmontop
flavorText: Its technique of kicking while spinning is a remarkable mix of both offense and defense. ___ travel faster spinning than they do walking.

name: smoochum
flavorText: It actively runs about, but also falls often. Whenever it falls, it will check its reflection on a lake’s surface to make sure its face hasn’t become dirty.

name: elekid
flavorText: If it touches metal and discharges the electricity it has stored in its body, an ___ begins swinging its arms in circles to recharge itself.

name: magby
flavorText: If a ___ is spouting yellow flames from its mouth, it is in good health. When it is fatigued, black smoke will be mixed in with the flames.

name: miltank
flavorText: It gives over five gallons of milk daily. Its sweet milk is enjoyed by children and grown-ups alike. People who can’t drink milk turn it into yogurt and eat it instead.

name: blissey
flavorText: If it senses sadness with its fluffy fur, a ___ will rush over to the sad person, however far away, to share an egg of happiness that brings a smile to any face.

name: raikou
flavorText: ___ embodies the speed of lightning. Its roars send shock waves shuddering through the air and ground as if lightning bolts were crashing down.

name: entei
flavorText: ___ embodies the passion of magma. It is thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano. It blasts fire that consumes all that it touches.

name: suicune
flavorText: ___ embodies the compassion of a pure spring of water. It runs across the land with gliding elegance. It has the power to purify dirty water.

name: larvitar
flavorText: A ___ is born deep under the ground. It must eat its way through the soil above and reach the surface for it to see its parents’ faces.

name: pupitar
flavorText: A ___ creates a gas inside its body that it ejects under compression to propel itself like a jet. Its body can withstand a collision with solid steel.

name: tyranitar
flavorText: A ___ is so overwhelmingly powerful, it can bring down a whole mountain to make its nest. It roams in mountains seeking new opponents to fight.

name: lugia
flavorText: ___ is so powerful even a light fluttering of its wings can blow apart houses. As a result, it chooses to live out of sight deep under the sea.

name: ho-oh
flavorText: Its feathers--which glow in seven colors depending on the angle at which they are struck by light--are thought to bring joy. It is said to live at the foot of a rainbow.

name: celebi
flavorText: This POKéMON came from the future by crossing over time. It is thought that so long as ___ appears, a bright and shining future awaits us.

name: treecko
flavorText: It makes its nest in a giant tree in the forest. It ferociously guards against anything nearing its territory. It is said to be the protector of the forest’s trees.

name: grovyle
flavorText: Leaves grow out of this POKéMON’s body. They help obscure a ___ from the eyes of its enemies while it is in a thickly overgrown forest.

name: sceptile
flavorText: In the jungle, its power is without equal. This POKéMON carefully grows trees and plants. It regulates its body temperature by basking in sunlight.

name: torchic
flavorText: If attacked, it strikes back by spitting balls of fire it forms in its stomach. A ___ dislikes darkness because it can’t see its surroundings.

name: combusken
flavorText: It lashes out with 10 kicks per second. Its strong fighting instinct compels it to keep up its offensive until the opponent gives up.

name: blaziken
flavorText: It learns martial arts that use punches and kicks. Every several years, its old feathers burn off, and new, supple feathers grow back in their place.

name: mudkip
flavorText: On land, it can powerfully lift large boulders by planting its four feet and heaving. It sleeps by burying itself in soil at the water’s edge.

name: marshtomp
flavorText: Its toughened hind legs enable it to stand upright. Because it weakens if its skin dries out, it replenishes fluids by playing in mud.

name: swampert
flavorText: If it senses the approach of a storm and a tidal wave, it protects its seaside nest by piling up boulders. It swims as fast as a jet ski.

name: poochyena
flavorText: It savagely threatens foes with bared fangs. It chases after fleeing targets tenaciously. It turns tail and runs, however, if the foe strikes back.

name: mightyena
flavorText: In the wild, ___ live in a pack. They never defy their leader’s orders. They defeat foes with perfectly coordinated teamwork.

name: zigzagoon
flavorText: Rubbing its nose against the ground, it always wanders about back and forth in search of something. It is distinguished by the zigzag footprints it leaves.

name: linoone
flavorText: It is exceedingly fast if it only has to run in a straight line. When it spots pond- dwelling prey underwater, it quickly leaps in and catches it with its sharp claws.

name: wurmple
flavorText: It sticks to tree branches and eats leaves. The thread it spits from its mouth, which becomes gooey when it touches air, slows the movement of its foes.

name: silcoon
flavorText: It prepares for evolution using the energy it stored while it was a ___. It keeps watch over the surroundings with its two eyes.

name: beautifly
flavorText: Its colorfully patterned wings are its most prominent feature. It flies through flower-covered fields collecting pollen. It attacks ferociously when angered.

name: cascoon
flavorText: To avoid detection by its enemies, it hides motionlessly beneath large leaves and in the gaps of branches. It also attaches dead leaves to its body for camouflage.

name: dustox
flavorText: It is a nocturnal POKéMON that flies from fields and mountains to the attraction of streetlights at night. It looses highly toxic powder from its wings.

name: lotad
flavorText: This POKéMON lives in ponds with clean water. It is known to ferry small POKéMON across ponds by carrying them on the broad leaf on its head.

name: lombre
flavorText: In the evening, it takes great delight in popping out of rivers and startling people. It feeds on aquatic moss that grows on rocks in the riverbed.

name: ludicolo
flavorText: When it hears festive music, all the cells in its body become stimulated, and it begins moving in rhythm. It does not quail even when it faces a tough opponent.

name: seedot
flavorText: It hangs off branches and absorbs nutrients. When it finishes eating, its body becomes so heavy that it drops to the ground with a thump.

name: nuzleaf
flavorText: A forest-dwelling POKéMON that is skilled at climbing trees. Its long and pointed nose is its weak point. It loses power if the nose is gripped.

name: shiftry
flavorText: It is said to arrive on chilly, wintry winds. Feared from long ago as the guardian of forests, this POKéMON lives in a deep forest where people do not venture.

name: taillow
flavorText: Although it is small, it is very courageous. It will take on a larger SKARMORY on an equal footing. However, its will weakens if it becomes hungry.

name: swellow
flavorText: A ___ dives upon prey from far above. It never misses its targets. It takes to the skies in search of lands with a warm climate.

name: wingull
flavorText: It makes its nest on a sheer cliff at the edge of the sea. It has trouble keeping its wings flapping in flight. Instead, it soars on updrafts.

name: pelipper
flavorText: It skims the tops of waves as it flies. When it spots prey, it uses its large beak to scoop up the victim with water. It protects its eggs in its beak.

name: ralts
flavorText: A ___ has the power to sense the emotions of people and POKéMON with the horns on its head. It takes cover if it senses any hostility.

name: kirlia
flavorText: A ___ has the psychic power to create  a rip in the dimensions and see into the future. It is said to dance with pleasure on sunny mornings.

name: gardevoir
flavorText: It apparently does not feel the pull of gravity because it supports itself with psychic power. It will give its life to protect its TRAINER.

name: surskit
flavorText: They gather on puddles after evening downpours, gliding across the surface of water as if sliding. It secretes honey with a sweet aroma from its head.

name: masquerain
flavorText: It intimidates foes with the large eyelike patterns on its antennae. Because it can’t fly if its wings get wet, it shelters itself from rain under large trees and eaves.

name: shroomish
flavorText: It loves to eat damp, composted soil in forests. If you enter a forest after a long rain, you can see many ___ feasting on composted soil.

name: breloom
flavorText: It scatters spores from holes in the cap on its head. It loves warm and humid climates. It feeds on trees and plants in fields and forests.

name: slakoth
flavorText: It sleeps virtually all day and night long. It doesn’t change its nest its entire life, but it sometimes travels great distances by swimming in rivers.

name: vigoroth
flavorText: It can’t keep still because its blood boils with energy. It runs through the fields and mountains all day to calm itself. If it doesn’t, it can’t sleep at night.

name: slaking
flavorText: Hordes of ___ gather around trees when fruits come into season. They wait around patiently for ripened fruits to fall out of the trees.

name: nincada
flavorText: It makes its nest at the roots of a mighty tree. Using its whiskerlike antennae, it probes its surroundings in the pitch-black darkness of soil.

name: ninjask
flavorText: Because it darts about vigorously at high speed, it is very difficult to see. Hearing its distinctive cries for too long induces a headache.

name: shedinja
flavorText: A peculiar POKéMON that floats in air even though its wings remain completely still. The inside of its body is hollow and utterly dark.

name: whismur
flavorText: Its cries equal a jet plane in volume. It inhales through its ear canals. Because of this system, it can cry continually without having to catch its breath.

name: loudred
flavorText: It positions the round speakers on its head to assail foes with ultrasonic waves at massive volume. It builds power by stomping the ground.

name: exploud
flavorText: It has sound-generating organs all over its body. It communicates with others by adjusting the tone and volume of the cries it emits.

name: makuhita
flavorText: It loves to toughen up its body above all else. If you hear quaking rumbles in a cave, it is the sound of ___ undertaking strenuous training.

name: hariyama
flavorText: It has the habit of challenging others without hesitation to tests of strength. It’s been known to stand on train tracks and stop trains using forearm thrusts.

name: azurill
flavorText: Its tail, which is packed with nutrition, is very bouncy like a rubber ball. On sunny days they gather at the edge of water and splash about for fun.

name: nosepass
flavorText: Its body emits a powerful magnetism. It feeds on prey that is pulled in by the force. Its magnetism is stronger in cold seasons.

name: skitty
flavorText: A ___’s adorably cute behavior makes it highly popular. In battle, it makes its tail puff out. It threatens foes with a sharp growl.

name: delcatty
flavorText: Rather than keeping a permanent lair, it habitually seeks comfortable spots and sleeps there. It is nocturnal and becomes active at dusk.

name: sableye
flavorText: It digs branching holes in caves using its sharp claws in search of food--raw gems. A ___ lurks in darkness and is seen only rarely.

name: mawile
flavorText: Its giant jaws are actually steel horns that transformed. It fools foes into complacency with its adorable gestures, then chomps them with its huge jaws.

name: aron
flavorText: A POKéMON that is clad in steel armor. A new suit of armor is made when it evolves. The old, discarded armor is salvaged as metal for making iron products.

name: lairon
flavorText: When two ___ meet in the wild, they fight for territory by bashing into each other with their steel bodies. The sound of their collision carries for miles.

name: aggron
flavorText: Its iron horns grow longer a little at a time. They are used to determine the ___’s age. The gouges in its armor are worn with pride as mementos from battles.

name: meditite
flavorText: It continually meditates for hours every day. As a result of rigorous and dedicated yoga training, it has tempered its spiritual power so much it can fly.

name: medicham
flavorText: Through crushingly harsh yoga training, it gained the power to foretell its foe’s actions. It battles with elegant, dance- like movement.

name: electrike
flavorText: It generates electricity using friction from the atmosphere. In seasons with especially arid air, its entire body blazes with violent showers of sparks.

name: manectric
flavorText: Because lightning falls in their vicinities, ___ were thought to have been born from lightning. In battle, they create thunderclouds.

name: plusle
flavorText: It has the trait of cheering on its fellow POKéMON. By shorting out the electricity it releases from its paws, it creates pom-poms for cheering.

name: minun
flavorText: At a meeting of POKéMON academics, it was announced that simultaneous exposure to electricity from a ___ and ___ will promote circulation and boost vitality.

name: volbeat
flavorText: With their taillights lit, ___ fly in a swarm, drawing geometric designs in the night sky. They move their nests if their pond water becomes dirty.

name: illumise
flavorText: A nocturnal POKéMON that becomes active upon nightfall. It leads a VOLBEAT swarm to draw patterns in the night sky. Over 200 different patterns have been confirmed.

name: roselia
flavorText: A ___ that drinks nutritionally rich springwater blooms with lovely flowers. The fragrance of its flowers has the effect of making its foes careless.

name: gulpin
flavorText: This POKéMON’s stomach fluid can even digest scrap iron. In one gulp, it can swallow something that is as large as itself.

name: swalot
flavorText: Its powerful stomach acid is capable of digesting almost anything. The one thing in the whole world a ___ can’t digest is its own stomach.

name: carvanha
flavorText: ___ attack ships in swarms, making them sink. Although it is said to be a very vicious POKéMON, it timidly flees as soon as it finds itself alone.

name: sharpedo
flavorText: The vicious and sly gangster of the sea. Its skin is specially textured to minimize drag in water. Its speed tops out at over 75 miles per hour.

name: wailmer
flavorText: While this POKéMON usually lives in the sea, it can survive on land, although not too long. It loses vitality if its body becomes dried out.

name: wailord
flavorText: It breathes through nostrils that it raises above the sea. By inhaling to its maximum capacity, a ___ can dive close to 10,000 feet beneath the waves.

name: numel
flavorText: A ___ stores boiling magma in the hump on its back. It is a hardy POKéMON that can transport a 220-pound load. It has served humans at work since long ago.

name: camerupt
flavorText: A POKéMON that lives in the crater of a volcano. Every 10 years, the volcanoes on its back erupt violently. Research is under way on the cause of eruption.

name: torkoal
flavorText: It battles using energy it gets from burning coal. When loosing smoke from its nostrils, it lets off a sound that is similar to a locomotive’s horn.

name: spoink
flavorText: A POKéMON that manipulates psychic power at will. It doesn’t stop bouncing even when it is asleep. It loves eating mushrooms that grow underground.

name: grumpig
flavorText: It stores power in the black pearls on its forehead. When it uses psychic power, it performs an odd dance step. Its style of dancing became hugely popular overseas.

name: spinda
flavorText: It is distinguished by a pattern of spots that is always different. Its unsteady, tottering walk has the effect of fouling its foe’s aim.

name: trapinch
flavorText: Its big jaws crunch through boulders. Because its head is so big, it has a hard time getting back upright if it tips over onto its back.

name: vibrava
flavorText: It looses ultrasonic waves by rubbing its wings together. Since a ___’s wings are still in the process of growing, it can only fly short distances.

name: flygon
flavorText: The flapping of its wings sounds like singing. To prevent detection by enemies, it hides itself by flapping up a cloud of desert sand.

name: cacnea
flavorText: ___ live in deserts with virtually no rainfall. It battles by swinging its thick, spiked arms. Once a year, a yellow flower blooms.

name: cacturne
flavorText: After spending thousands of years in harsh deserts, its blood transformed into the same substances as sand. It is nocturnal, so it hunts at night.

name: swablu
flavorText: A POKéMON that has wings like cottony clouds. After enduring winter, in which little food is available, ___ flocks move closer to towns in the spring.

name: altaria
flavorText: It hums in a beautiful soprano voice. It flies among white clouds in the blue sky. It launches intensely hot fireballs from its mouth.

name: zangoose
flavorText: When it battles, it stands on its hind legs and attacks with its sharply clawed forelegs. Its fur bristles if it encounters any SEVIPER.

name: seviper
flavorText: ___ and ZANGOOSE are eternal rivals. It counters a ZANGOOSE’s dazzling agility with its swordlike tail, which also oozes a horrible poison.

name: lunatone
flavorText: It becomes very active on the night of a full moon. This POKéMON was first discovered 40 years ago at the site of a meteor strike.

name: solrock
flavorText: Solar energy is the source of this  POKéMON’s power. On sunny days, groups of ___ line up facing the sun and absorb its light.

name: barboach
flavorText: Its body is covered with a slimy film. The film acts as a barrier to prevent germs in muddy water from entering the ___’s body.

name: whiscash
flavorText: Mysteriously, it can foretell earthquakes. In the daytime, it sleeps in mud at the bottom of a pond. When it awakens, it continually feeds throughout the night.

name: corphish
flavorText: Once it grips prey with its large pincers, it will never let go, no matter what. It is a hardy POKéMON that can thrive in any environment.

name: crawdaunt
flavorText: A brutish POKéMON that loves to battle. A veteran ___ that has prevailed in hundreds of battles has giant pincers marked with countless scars.

name: baltoy
flavorText: A ___ moves by spinning on its single foot. It has been depicted in murals  adorning the walls of a once-bustling city in an ancient age.

name: claydol
flavorText: A ___ sleeps while hovering in midair. Its arms are separate from its body. They are kept floating by the POKéMON’s manipulation of psychic power.

name: lileep
flavorText: It disguises itself as seaweed by making its tentacles sway. Unsuspecting prey that come too close are swallowed whole. It became extinct 100 million years ago.

name: cradily
flavorText: It drags its heavy body along the seafloor. It makes its nest in the shallows of warm seas. ___ can be seen on beaches when the tide goes out.

name: anorith
flavorText: It was resurrected from a fossil using the power of science. It swims by undulating the eight wings at its sides. They were feet that adapted to life in the sea.

name: armaldo
flavorText: ___ usually lives on land. However, when it hunts for prey, it dives beneath the ocean. It swims around using its two large wings.

name: feebas
flavorText: ___ live in ponds that are heavily infested with weeds. Because of its hopelessly shabby appearance, it seems as if few TRAINERS raise it.

name: milotic
flavorText: It is said to live at the bottom of large lakes. Considered to be the most beautiful of all POKéMON, it has been depicted in paintings and statues.

name: castform
flavorText: It alters its form depending on the weather. Changes in the climate such as the temperature and humidity appear to affect its cellular structure.

name: kecleon
flavorText: A POKéMON that has the ability to alter its body colors to match its surroundings. A ___ reverts to its original colors if it is startled.

name: shuppet
flavorText: This POKéMON roams about deep in the night seeking such negative emotions as grudges and envy. It retreats to its nest when the sun begins to rise.

name: banette
flavorText: An abandoned plush doll became this POKéMON. They are said to live in garbage dumps and wander about in search of the children that threw them away.

name: duskull
flavorText: A glare from its single scarlet eye makes even burly grown-ups freeze in utter fear. It is a nocturnal POKéMON that roams about under the cloak of darkness.

name: dusclops
flavorText: It is thought that its body is hollow with only a spectral ball of fire burning inside. However, no one has been able to confirm this theory as fact.

name: tropius
flavorText: It flies by flapping its broad leaves. The bunch of fruit that grows around its neck is deliciously sweet. In the spring, it scatters pollen from its neck.

name: chimecho
flavorText: They fly about very actively when the hot season arrives. They communicate among themselves using seven different and distinguishing cries.

name: absol
flavorText: It sharply senses even subtle changes in the sky and the land to predict natural disasters. It is a long-lived POKéMON that has a life-span of 100 years.

name: wynaut
flavorText: A ___ loves to eat sweet fruits. It cleverly picks fruits using its earlike arms. They gather in fruit gardens, drawn by the fragrance.

name: snorunt
flavorText: They tend to move about in groups of around five ___. In snowy regions, it is said that when they are seen late at night, snowfall will arrive by morning.

name: glalie
flavorText: A ___ has the power to instantaneously freeze moisture in the atmosphere. A dazzling cloud of diamondlike ice crystals forms around its body.

name: spheal
flavorText: It is completely covered with plushy fur. As a result, it never feels the cold even when it is rolling about on ice floes or diving in the sea.

name: sealeo
flavorText: ___ live in herds on ice floes. Using its powerful flippers, it shatters ice. It dives into the sea to hunt prey five times a day.

name: walrein
flavorText: To protect its herd, the leader battles anything that invades its territory, even at the cost of its life. Its tusks may snap off in battle.

name: clamperl
flavorText: A ___ slams its shell closed on prey to prevent escape. The pearl it creates upon evolution is said to be infused with a mysterious energy.

name: huntail
flavorText: To withstand the crushing pressure of water deep under the sea, its spine is very thick and sturdy. Its tail, which is shaped like a small fish, has eyes that light up.

name: gorebyss
flavorText: A ___ siphons the body fluids of prey through its thin, tubular mouth. Its light pink body color turns vivid when it finishes feeding.

name: relicanth
flavorText: A POKéMON that was once believed to have been extinct. The species has not changed its form for 100 million years. It walks on the seafloor using its pectoral fins.

name: luvdisc
flavorText: ___ make the branches of CORSOLA their nests. There is a custom from long ago of giving a ___ as a gift to express one’s feelings of love.

name: bagon
flavorText: Although it is small, this POKéMON is very powerful because its body is a bundle of muscles. It launches head-butts with its ironlike skull.

name: shelgon
flavorText: It hardly eats while it awaits evolution. It becomes hardier by enduring hunger. Its shell peels off the instant it begins to evolve.

name: salamence
flavorText: After many long years, its cellular structure underwent a sudden mutation to grow wings. When angered, it loses all thought and rampages out of control.

name: beldum
flavorText: When ___ gather in a swarm, they move in perfect unison as if they were but one POKéMON. They communicate with each other using brain waves.

name: metang
flavorText: The claws tipping its arms pack the destructive power to tear through thick iron sheets as if they were silk. It flies at over 60 miles per hour.

name: metagross
flavorText: ___ has four brains that are joined by a complex neural network. As a result of integration, this POKéMON is smarter than a supercomputer.

name: regirock
flavorText: A POKéMON that is made entirely of rocks and boulders. If parts of its body chip off in battle, ___ repairs itself by adding new rocks.

name: regice
flavorText: Its entire body is made of Antarctic ice. After extensive studies, researchers believe the ice was formed during an ice age.

name: registeel
flavorText: Its body is harder than any other kind of metal. The body metal is composed of a mysterious substance. Not only is it hard, it shrinks and stretches flexibly.

name: latias
flavorText: They make a small herd of only several members. They rarely make contact with people or other POKéMON. They disappear if they sense enemies.

name: latios
flavorText: Even in hiding, it can detect the locations of others and sense their emotions since it has telepathy. Its intelligence allows it to understand human languages.

name: kyogre
flavorText: ___ has appeared in mythology as the creator of the sea. After long years of feuding with GROUDON, it took to sleep at the bottom of the sea.

name: groudon
flavorText: ___ has appeared in mythology as the creator of the land. It sleeps in magma underground and is said to make volcanoes erupt on awakening.

name: rayquaza
flavorText: A POKéMON that flies endlessly in the ozone layer. It is said it would descend to the ground if KYOGRE and GROUDON were to fight.

name: jirachi
flavorText: ___ is said to make wishes come true. While it sleeps, a tough crystalline shell envelops the body to protect it from enemies.

name: deoxys
flavorText: A POKéMON that mutated from an extraterrestrial virus exposed to a laser beam. Its body is configured for superior agility and speed.
